text: This is a list of social platforms by monthly active users (MAU). The daily active users (DAU) is also presented when available. As of April 2020, there are now 3.81 billion social media users around the world, representing 49 percent of the world’s total population.https://datareportal.com/social-media- users * Facebook (micro-blogging) - 2.5 billion in January 2020 — and 1.6 billion daily active users (DAU) https://www.statista.com/statistics/346167/facebook-global-dau/ * WhatsApp (messaging) - 1.5 billion in December 2017 https://www.statista.com/statistics/260819/number-of-monthly-active-whatsapp- users/ — 1 billion DAU https://fortunly.com/statistics/whatsapp- statistics#gref * Facebook Messenger (messaging) - 1.3 billion in September 2017 https://venturebeat.com/2017/09/14/facebook-messenger-passes-1-3-billion- monthly-active-users/ * WeChat (messaging) - 1.1 billion in December 2019 https://www.statista.com/statistics/255778/number-of-active-wechat-messenger- accounts/ * Instagram (photo sharing) - 1 billion in June 2018 — and 500 million DAU https://www.oberlo.com/blog/instagram-stats-every-marketer-should- know * QQ (messaging) - 808 million in 2013 https://statstic.com/qq-monthly- active-users/ — 267 million DAU https://www.dragonsocial.net/blog/social- media-in-china/ * Qzone (blog) - 654 million in 2014 https://statstic.com/monthly-active-users-maus-of-qzone/ * Sina Weibo (micro- blogging) - 516 million in December 2019 https://www.chinainternetwatch.com/tag/weibo/ — 211 million DAU https://www.chinainternetwatch.com/29728/weibo-q2-2019/ * Reddit (forum) - 430 million in October 2019 https://techcrunch.com/2019/12/04/reddits-monthly- active-user-base-grew-30-to-reach-430m-in-2019/ * Telegram (messaging) - 400 million in April 2020 https://www.androidpolice.com/2020/04/24/telegram-6-1-400-million-monthly- active-users/ * Snapchat (messaging) - 381.5 million in March 2020 https://websitebuilder.org/snapchat-statistics/ — 218 million DAU https://zephoria.com/top-10-valuable-snapchat-statistics/ * Twitter (micro- blogging) - 336 million in the first quarter of 2018 https://www.statista.com/statistics/282087/number-of-monthly-active-twitter- users/ — 145 million DAU https://www.oberlo.com/blog/twitter-statistics * Pinterest (social media) - 300 million in August 2019 https://www.cnn.com/2019/08/01/tech/pinterest-earnings/index.html * Baidu Tieba (forum) - 300 million in 2015 https://www.dragonsocial.net/blog/what-is- baidu-tieba/ * Quora (Q&A;) - 300 million in 2019 https://www.vox.com/recode/2019/5/16/18627157/quora-value-billion-question- answer * Zoom (videotelephony) - 300 million in 2020 https://www.theverge.com/2020/4/23/21232401/zoom-300-million-users-growth- coronavirus-pandemic-security-privacy-concerns-response == See also == * List of content platforms by monthly active users ==References== ==External links== * https://datareportal.com/social-media-users * https://www.statista.com/statistics/272014/global-social-networks-ranked-by- number-of-users/ Category:Internet-related lists
title: List of social platforms by monthly active users
